title: Gotta nerf those siege minions...
body: Siege minions with Baron buff can hit turrets while standing out of turret range... wtf

replies.body:
Definitely intentional. Baron buff is the "We are really good at sieging" objective. Without the extra regen from the buff, since that got taken off in the patch, the goal for the defending team is to find that one really good engage and force them to recall.

The follow-up is then, because the minions are only strong when around champions, you immediately shove as many minion waves as possible and try to create a decent split push.

Certainly, Baron is powerful and can help a team win, but the champions themselves are not powered up all that much, so you can fight back.

Yeah, I know it was intentional, but with siege minions spawning in every wave post 35 minutes, theres no "turret hugging" defence anymore. So what Riot basically want you to do is either give up the tower for free or force a fight. No more turtling.

I mean, those turret lasers can barely defend themselves against normal minions they feel so weak LOL
I think it's intentional. Remember the minions only get the buffs while an allied champion is nearby, it's part of what makes Baron buff the ultimate siege tool.
